message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XFV_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Start Date should not be after the End Date.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_FUND_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, should not be before the fund Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_FUND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, should not be after the fund End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_STARTDATE_BEFORE_FISCALYEAR_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Start Date, %1d, should not be before the fiscal year Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_ENDDATE_AFTER_FISCALYEAR_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date, %1d, should not be after the fiscal year End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_FV_BUDGETALLOCALTEDAMOUNT_LESS_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: The Initial Budget Allocation Amount must be greater than or equal to zero.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_LINE_ITEM_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_AS_DEBIT_CREDIT_BALANCE
message.locale: The Fund Fiscal Year Line Item cannot be deleted as it has a balance for the fund fiscal year.

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_EXIST_BETWEEN_ORIGINAL_STARTDATE_AND_PROPOSED_STARTDATE_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Fund Fiscal Year line item has budget adjustments created for the period between the %1d and %2d, the start date cannot be modified..

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_BUDGETADJUSTMENT_EXIST_BETWEEN_ORIGINAL_ENDDATE_AND_PROPOSED_ENDDATE_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The Fund Fiscal Year line item has budget adjustments created for the period between the %1d and %2d, the end date cannot be modified..

message.name: ERR_FUNDFISCALYEARLINEITEM_XRV_OBLIGATION_IS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_FUND_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: The Fund Fiscal Year Line Item cannot be deleted, there are obligations created against the fund fiscal year.
